Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED5 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCRED5 ( ITCRED5CODI, PROYCODI, CAIGEN, IDGEN, BARRA, PDMW, PNMW, QNMIN, QNMA, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCRED5CODI, :PROYCODI, :CAIGEN, :IDGEN, :BARRA, :PDMW, :PNMW, :QNMIN, :QNMA, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCRED5 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, CAIGEN = :CAIGEN, IDGEN = :IDGEN, BARRA = :BARRA, PDMW = :PDMW, PNMW = :PNMW, QNMIN = :QNMIN, QNMA = :QNMA, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCRED5CODI = :ITCRED5CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED5 ORDER BY ITCRED5CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCRED5 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED5 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCRED5CODI ASC
